trans-unit.source: Represents image data returned by a decoder and accepted by encoders.
trans-unit.target: Representa os dados de imagem devolvido por um descodificador e aceite pelo codificadores.

trans-unit.source: BitmapFrame provides additional functionality not defined by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by providing access to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> associated with a particular frame of an image.
trans-unit.target: BitmapFrame fornece funcionalidades adicionais não definidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>ao conceder acesso a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A>associado um intervalo específico de uma imagem.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>

trans-unit.source: BitmapFrame also supports the writing of metadata information by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: BitmapFrame também suporta a escrita de informações de metadados utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any BitmapFrame returned from a decoder is always frozen.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer BitmapFrame devolvido por um descodificador sempre está fixa.

trans-unit.source: If you require a modifiable copy, you must first create a copy of the BitmapFrame by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se necessitar de uma cópia modificável, primeiro tem de criar uma cópia do BitmapFrame utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] format images support multiple frames.
trans-unit.target: Apenas [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] formato imagens suportam frames Jumbo vários.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the base <xref:System.Uri> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém ou define um valor que representa a base de <xref:System.Uri>do contexto atual.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>do contexto atual.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> objects that are associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> objetos que estão associados este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> objects that are associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção só de leitura de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> objetos que estão associados este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref> de um determinado <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The `bitmapStream` can be closed after the frame is created only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option is used.
trans-unit.target: O `bitmapStream` pode ser fechada depois de moldura é criada apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>for utilizada a opção de cache.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains the stream until the frame is needed.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>opção cache mantém o fluxo até que o intervalo é necessária.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29> method to specify create and cache options.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29>método para especificar criar e opções de cache.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> that is used to construct the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Stream>que é utilizado para construir o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref> de um determinado <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref> de um determinado <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that identifies the source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>que identifica a origem do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Criar é apresentado no .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.target: A localização do mapa de bits a partir do qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref> é criado.

trans-unit.target: Os requisitos de colocação em cache para este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref> de um determinado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> com a miniatura especificada.

trans-unit.source: The source from which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> is constructed.
trans-unit.target: A origem a partir do qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref> é construído.

trans-unit.source: A thumbnail image of the resulting <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma imagem em miniatura da resultante <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref> de um determinado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> com a miniatura especificada.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.IO.Stream> with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref> de um determinado <xref:System.IO.Stream>com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the bitmap is created.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>cache opção se pretender fechar os `bitmapStream` depois de criado o mapa de bits.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>opção cache mantém o acesso no fluxo até que o mapa de bits é necessário e limpeza é processada pelo garbage collector.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: The stream from which this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> is constructed.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo dos quais este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref> é construído.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> with the specified thumbnail, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref> de um determinado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> com a miniatura especificada, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"> </xref>, e <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> que é utilizado para construir este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A thumbnail image of the resulting <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma imagem em miniatura da resultante <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The metadata to associate with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os metadados para associar a este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> objetos que estão associados este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> with the specified thumbnail, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref> de um determinado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> com a miniatura especificada, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"> </xref>, e <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"></xref>, which can be used to associate metadata with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, cria uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"> </xref>, que pode ser utilizado para associar metadados com uma <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Metadata can only be added or edited using the CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter if the image file contains enough room for the new metadata; otherwise, metadata can be added using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os metadados só podem ser adicionado ou editado utilizando o CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter se o ficheiro de imagem contém espaço suficiente para novos metadados; caso contrário, os metadados podem ser adicionados utilizando a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the decoder associated with this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o descodificador associado a esta instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the thumbnail image associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém a imagem em miniatura associada a este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that represents a thumbnail of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> que representa uma miniatura de atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.
